newsitem.title: JAPAN: Foreigners neutral on Japan shares via 'Big Four'.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners neutral on Japan shares via 'Big Four'.

text.p: Orders placed by foreign investors through Japan's "Big Four" securities houses before the start of stock trading on Tuesday reflected a net neutral stance, market sources said.
Foreign investors placed 5.5 million shares of sell orders against a similar number of buys.
